sprint_goal: Establish core customer registration/login and the foundational admin user view.
epic_coverage: Customer Onboarding & Profile Management, Platform Administration
key_deliverables: Customer registration flow; Customer OTP login; Account lockout security feature; Admin user list dashboard.
demo_objectives: Demo a new customer registering, logging out, and logging back in. Show the new user appearing in the admin dashboard.
success_criteria: All authentication stories are E2E tested and secure; Admin dashboard can display registered users.
risk_factors: Complexity of AWS Cognito custom auth flow; External SMS gateway reliability.
mitigation_strategies: Early integration testing with AWS services; Implement robust logging for SMS gateway interactions.
integration_windows: Integration testing between mobile client and backend from Day 5.
burndown_target: Linear burndown with 12 points completed by end of Day 5.

sprint_goal: Enable Vendor and Rider registration, allowing the platform to start onboarding its supply-side users.
epic_coverage: Vendor Onboarding & Management, Rider Onboarding & Management
key_deliverables: Vendor web registration flow with document upload; Rider mobile registration flow with document upload; OTP login for Vendors and Riders.
demo_objectives: Demo a new vendor registering via the web dashboard. Demo a new rider registering via the mobile app. Show both new users in the admin dashboard with 'pending_verification' status.
success_criteria: Registration flows for all user types are complete; Secure document upload to S3 is functional.
risk_factors: Complexity of secure, multi-step forms with file uploads.
mitigation_strategies: Use pre-signed S3 URLs for secure, direct-to-S3 uploads to reduce server load and complexity.
burndown_target: Linear burndown with 12 points completed by end of Day 5.

sprint_goal: Build the complete admin workflow to review, approve, and reject new Vendor and Rider registrations, and establish the post-registration user experience.
epic_coverage: Platform Administration, Vendor Onboarding & Management, Rider Onboarding & Management
key_deliverables: Admin UI to list and review pending registrations; Functionality to approve/reject with reason; Automated approval/rejection notifications; 'Pending' status screens for users.
demo_objectives: Demo an admin approving a pending vendor, who then receives a notification and can log in to their dashboard. Demo an admin rejecting a rider with a reason.
success_criteria: Admins can fully manage the verification lifecycle; Notifications are reliably sent; State management for pending users is robust.
risk_factors: Complexity in coordinating state changes with notifications and audit logs.
mitigation_strategies: Use an event-driven architecture to decouple approval action from notification sending.
integration_windows: E2E testing of the full registration-to-approval flow in the second week.
burndown_target: Linear burndown with 13 points completed by end of Day 5.
